level.heading: Saving clause.
level.text: This subchapter does not prevent the recognition under principles of comity or otherwise of a foreign-country judgment not within the scope of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-86
level.text: For history of Law 19-86, see notes under § 15-361.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 11 of the Uniform Foreign-Country Money Judgments Recognition Act.
